trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Timmins
There were no other sightings in Timmins on or around August 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsDrew sketch after sighting. Told wife and showed her the sketch. This thing made 90 degree turn like something I've never seen as a pilot. Wife laughed until I showed her the thing seen in china the next day. Sure is similar.
Summary: Was observed on this date. Am a licences pilot. It made a 90degree turn from nort direction to east direction like a straight line north then a straight line east. Was not our aircraft. Same thing I seen was seen in china the next day.
